member.summary: Creates base payment result info object + add PayPal payment result properties.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentResultInfo.PayPalPaymentStatus
member.summary: PayPal payment status.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentResultInfo.PayPalPaymentVerified
member.summary: TRUE - payment was verified by IPN (Instant payment notification) successfully, payment is VALID. FALSE - payment verification by IPN failed, payment is INVALID.

member.name: T:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum
member.summary: PayPal payment status.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Unknown
member.summary: Payment status is not known.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Completed
member.summary: Payment has been completed, and the funds have been added successfully to merchant's account balance.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.CanceledReversal
member.summary: A reversal has been canceled. For example, merchant won a dispute with the customer, and the funds for the transaction that was reversed have been returned to merchant.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Denied
member.summary: When merchant denied the payment. This happens only if the payment was previously pending.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Expired
member.summary: This authorization has expired and cannot be captured.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Failed
member.summary: The payment has failed. This happens only if the payment was made from merchant customer's bank account.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.InProgress
member.summary: The transaction is in process of authorization and capture.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Pending
member.summary: The payment is pending.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Processed
member.summary: The payment has been accepted.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Refunded
member.summary: The payment was refunded.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Reversed
member.summary: The payment was reversed due to a chargeback or other type of reversal. The funds have been removed from merchant's account balance and returned to the buyer.

member.name: F:CMS.Ecommerce.PayPalPaymentStatusEnum.Voided
member.summary: This authorization has been voided.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo.ExchangeRate
member.summary: Exchange rate from site main currency to shopping cart currency. This exchange rate is applied to all site items (products, discounts, taxes, shipping option) which are present in the shopping cart to express their price in shopping curt currency.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo.ExchangeRateForGlobalItems
member.summary: Exchange rate from global main currency to shopping cart currency. This exchange rate is applied to all global items (products, discounts, taxes, shipping option) which are present in the shopping cart to express their price in shopping curt currency. If site uses global currencies, it is equeal to exchange rate from site main currency to shopping cart currency.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo.ExchangeRateToMainCurrency
member.summary: Exchange rate from global main currency to site main currency. This exchange rate is applied to all global items (products, discounts, taxes, shipping option) which are present in the shopping cart to express their price in site main currency. If site uses global currencies, it is equeal to 1.

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfoProvider.CheckShoppingCart(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo)
member.summary: Checks shopping cart items. If check fails, the specified error messages seperated by semicolon are returned, otherwise an empty string is returned. The following conditions must be met to pass the check: 1)All shopping cart items are enabled 2)Max units in one order are not exceeded 3)There is enough units in the inventory 4) Customer is registered, if there is a membership type product in the cart 5)Product validity is valid, if there is a membership or e-product type product in the cart

member.name: M:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfoProvider.CheckShoppingCartInternal(CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartInfo)
member.summary: Checks shopping cart items. If check fails, the specified error messages seperated by semicolon are returned, otherwise an empty string is returned. The following conditions must be met to pass the check: 1)All shopping cart items are enabled 2)Max units in one order are not exceeded 3)There is enough units in the inventory 4) Customer is registered, if there is a membership type product in the cart 5)Product validity is valid, if there is a membership or e-product type product in the cart

member.summary: If set, its value is used instead of the SKUPrice value in price calculation process. It is set only when cart item represents donation. Then it is amount of donation.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemIsPrivate
member.summary: It is set only when cart item represents donation. Then it indicates if the donation is private.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemValidTo
member.summary: It is set only when cart item represents e-product and when the cart item was loaded from the existing e-product order item. Then it is date and time until the e-product download links are valid.

member.name: P:CMS.Ecommerce.ShoppingCartItemInfo.CartItemText
member.summary: It is set only when cart item represents text product option. Then it is the text defined by the customer, e.g. custom label for a T-shirt.

member.summary: Checks shopping cart item in the shopping cart. If check fails the, specified error message is returned, otherwise an empty string is returned. The following conditions must be met to pass the check: 1)Shopping cart item is enabled 2)Max units in one order are not exceeded 3)There is enough units in the inventory 4) Customer is registered, if it is a membership type product 5)Product validity is valid, if it is a membership or e-product type product
